BadgeDetail.Name: Ambition
BadgeDetail.Description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated they have a strong determination to succeed. During induction they have demonstrated they have high aspirations of themselves and have a plan to achieve their goals.

Task.Title: Apirations
Task.Body: Complete your ‘My Goals’ page on ProPortal.If you’re outside of College, use your 6-digit userid and password to login.

If you’re outside of College, use your 6-digit userid and password to login.

Task.Title: Play the Game
Task.Body: Play ‘The Game’ and find out your ideal career. Upload a screenshot of your final profile.
